function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 pandemic impact on virtual and physical space","Impact":"Enormous impact on world history and community planning","Mitigation":"Adaptation of community service facility planning, adjustment to non-contact interaction activities","Technologies":"Virtual space technologies, community planning software","People":"Residents, urban community planners, public health officials","Owner":"Community planners, public health officials"},{"Description":"Reflection on the development of urban communities triggered by COVID-19","Impact":"Profound impact on the development of urban communities","Mitigation":"Implementation of sustainable and resilient development strategies","Technologies":"Urban planning software, sustainable development tools","People":"Urban community residents, planners, policymakers","Owner":"Urban planners, policymakers"}]}
